Html:
I've tried to look through some of the older discussions but I can't seem to find anything about this going back to November of last year.

I understand that the 'update item cache' options exist to update the information about existing items not add new items. Is there anyway other than waiting for a new version of rawr to come out to add new items that have recently been discovered?

Yes, I have seen information about being able to go in and manually add items, but is there an automated function to do this?

thanks
Technically, no. But what you're probably trying to do is get the new items which are upgrades, which yes you can do. Tools > Load Possible Upgrades from Armory/Wowhead.
